mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_traffic_wf_record (create_time, update_time, record_id, device_code, car_plate_number, car_plate_type, illegal_time, illegal_code, illegal_addr, collct_sector_code, collct_sector_name, entry_person, img_url, img_path ) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{recordId}, #{deviceCode}, #{carPlateNumber}, #{carPlateType}, #{illegalTime}, #{illegalCode}, #{illegalAddr}, #{collectSectorCode}, #{collectSectorName}, #{entryPerson}, #{imgUrl}, #{imgPath} )
